name: Vibe IDE — Max Vibe Edition
short_description: Branded static site on IBM Cloud with optional Cloud Functions.
long_description: Deploys a COS static website and, optionally, IBM Cloud Functions to push updates to the site or a project. Designed for frictionless demos and repeatable vibes.

inputs.name: resource_group_id
inputs.description: The ID of the IBM Cloud resource group in which to create resources.
